abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the First Northern
            Province Rural Development Project are: (a) to improve
            agricultural production and farm incomes in the center-north
            area of Cameroon's Northern Province by providing: (i)
            improved rural infrastructure, including roads, storage and
            marketplace facilities; and (ii) effective services,
            including input supply, supervised credit for purchase of
            draft animals and equipment, extension and training,
            marketing, and adaptive research; (b) to provide the
            principal executing agency, SODECOTON, with financial and
            technical assistance to extend its responsibilities for a
            wider range of rural development activities; and (c) to
            improve the effectiveness of existing administrative
            structures in the Northern Province in the planning,
            coordination and control of development projects, including
            monitoring and evaluation and agricultural research.
